import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import avatar from '../assets/User.png'; import { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import{ passwordValidate } from '../helper/validate' import styles from '../styles/UserName.module.css'; export default function Register() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues : { email : 'artgagarin2@gmail.com', username: 'example123', password : 'admin@123' }, validate : passwordValidate, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, onSubmit : async values => { console.log(values) } }) return (
